languages.text: "Это так! {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сестры битвы{/g}— это пламя, зажженное {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g}, это эхо его голоса, летящее по темным просторам Вселенной. Мы несем Его гнев еретикам, злодеям и другим врагам Человечества. Мы можем защищать верных от нечестивых и грешных. Иногда — словом. Чаще — болтером".

traits.locale_text: "Это так! {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сестры Битвы{/g}— это пламя, зажженное {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g}, это эхо его голоса, летящее по темным просторам Вселенной. Мы Его гнев еретикам, злодеям и другим врагам Человечества. Мы можем защищать верных от нечестивых и грешных. Иногда — словом. Чаще — болтером".

languages.text: "It is! The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters of Battle{/g} are a fire lit by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}. They are the echo of His voice that travels through the dark expanses of the universe. We bring His wrath to heretics, mutants, and other enemies of Humanity. We protect the faithful from the unholy and unhallowed. Sometimes with words. More often than not, with a bolter."
languages.original_text: "Это так! {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сестры битвы{/g}— это пламя, зажженное {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g}, это эхо его голоса, летящее по темным просторам Вселенной. Мы несем Его гнев еретикам, злодеям и другим врагам Человечества. Мы можем защищать верных от нечестивых и грешных. Иногда — словом. Чаще — болтером".

traits.locale_text: "It is! The Sisters of Battle are a fire lit by the Emperor, they are the echo of His voice that travels through the dark expanses of the universe. We bring His light to the faithful and His wrath to heretics, villains, and monsters. We can heal, inspire, edify, but first and foremost — protect the faithful from evil and darkness. Sometimes with words. More often than not with a bolter."

"It is! The Sisters of Battle are a fire lit by the Emperor, they are the echo of His voice that travels through the dark expanses of the universe. We bring His light to the faithful and His wrath to heretics, villains, and monsters. We can heal, inspire, edify, but first and foremost — protect the faithful from evil and darkness. Sometimes with words. More often than not with a bolter."

Sometimes with words. More often than not, with a bolter."

"It is! The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters of Battle{/g} are a fire lit by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}. They are the echo of His voice that travels through the dark expanses of the universe. We bring His wrath to heretics, mutants, and other enemies of Humanity. We protect the faithful from the unholy and unhallowed. Sometimes with words. More often than not, with a bolter."

languages.text: “是这样的！{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}战斗修女{/g}是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}亲手点燃的烈焰。我们是祂的话语的回声，在黑暗的宇宙中四处散播。我们会将祂的愤怒带给异端分子、变种人，以及其他一切人类之敌。我们会保护虔诚之人免受邪恶与亵渎的伤害。有的时候是用祈祷，而更多的时候，是用爆矢枪。”
languages.original_text: "It is! The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters of Battle{/g} are a fire lit by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}. They are the echo of His voice that travels through the dark expanses of the universe. We bring His wrath to heretics, mutants, and other enemies of Humanity. We protect the faithful from the unholy and unhallowed. Sometimes with words. More often than not, with a bolter."

traits.locale_text: “是这样的！{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}战斗修女{/g}是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}亲手点燃的烈焰。我们是祂的话语的回声，在黑暗的宇宙中四处散播。我们会将祂的愤怒带给异端分子、变种人，以及其他一切人类之敌。我们会保护虔诚之人免受邪恶与亵渎的伤害。有的时候是用祈祷，而更多的时候，是用爆矢枪。”

languages.original_text: "It is! The Sisters of Battle are a fire lit by the God-Emperor. They are the echo of His voice that travels through the dark expanses of the universe. We bring His wrath to heretics, mutants, and other enemies of Humanity. We protect the faithful from the unholy and unhallowed. Sometimes with words. More often than not, with a bolter."

languages.text: «¡Así es! Las {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Hermanas de Batalla{/g} somos un fuego encendido por el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g}. Somos el eco de Su voz, que recorre los confines más oscuros del universo. Traemos Su ira a los herejes, los mutantes y demás enemigos de la Humanidad. Protegemos a los fieles de lo impío y lo sacrílego. A veces con palabras, pero la mayoría de las veces con un bólter».
languages.original_text: "It is! The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters of Battle{/g} are a fire lit by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}. They are the echo of His voice that travels through the dark expanses of the universe. We bring His wrath to heretics, mutants, and other enemies of Humanity. We protect the faithful from the unholy and unhallowed. Sometimes with words. More often than not, with a bolter."

traits.locale_text: «¡Así es! Las {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Hermanas de Batalla{/g} somos un fuego encendido por el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g}. Somos el eco de Su voz, que recorre los confines más oscuros del universo. Traemos Su ira a los herejes, los mutantes y demás enemigos de la Humanidad. Protegemos a los fieles de lo impío y lo sacrílego. A veces con palabras, pero la mayoría de las veces con un bólter».

languages.text: 「そうだとも！{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}戦闘修道女{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}が灯した炎だ。それらは神帝陛下の声のこだまであり、宇宙に広がる闇を駆け巡るのだ。我らは異端者、変異体、その他人類の敵に主の怒りをもたらす。そして我らは不浄なるものから信徒を守る。時には言葉で。多くの場合、ボルターによって」
languages.original_text: "It is! The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters of Battle{/g} are a fire lit by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}. They are the echo of His voice that travels through the dark expanses of the universe. We bring His wrath to heretics, mutants, and other enemies of Humanity. We protect the faithful from the unholy and unhallowed. Sometimes with words. More often than not, with a bolter."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだとも！{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}戦闘修道女{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}が灯した炎だ。それらは神帝陛下の声のこだまであり、宇宙に広がる闇を駆け巡るのだ。我らは異端者、変異体、その他人類の敵に主の怒りをもたらす。そして我らは不浄なるものから信徒を守る。時には言葉で。多くの場合、ボルターによって」

languages.text: "Ja! Die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Schwestern der Schlacht{/g} sind ein Feuer, das vom {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperator{/g} entfacht wurde. Sie sind das Echo seiner Stimme, die durch die dunklen Weiten des Universums reist. Wir tragen seinen Zorn zu Ketzern, Mutanten und anderen Feinden der Menschheit. Wir beschützen die Gläubigen vor den Unheiligen und Ungesegneten. Manchmal mit Worten. Meist mit einem Bolter."
languages.original_text: "It is! The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters of Battle{/g} are a fire lit by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}. They are the echo of His voice that travels through the dark expanses of the universe. We bring His wrath to heretics, mutants, and other enemies of Humanity. We protect the faithful from the unholy and unhallowed. Sometimes with words. More often than not, with a bolter."

traits.locale_text: "Ja! Die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Schwestern der Schlacht{/g} sind ein Feuer, das vom {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperator{/g} entfacht wurde. Sie sind das Echo seiner Stimme, die durch die dunklen Weiten des Universums reist. Wir tragen seinen Zorn zu Ketzern, Mutanten und anderen Feinden der Menschheit. Wir beschützen die Gläubigen vor den Unheiligen und Ungesegneten. Manchmal mit Worten. Meist mit einem Bolter."

languages.text: « C'est vrai! Les {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sœurs de Bataille{/g} sont comme un brasier allumé par l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} en personne. Elles se font l'écho de Sa voix qui voyage jusque dans les recoins les plus sombres de l'univers. Nous portons Sa colère qui s'abat sur les hérétiques, les mutants et les autres ennemis de l'humanité. Nous protégeons les fidèles des impies et des profanes. Parfois avec des mots. Et le plus souvent avec un bolter. »
languages.original_text: "It is! The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters of Battle{/g} are a fire lit by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}. They are the echo of His voice that travels through the dark expanses of the universe. We bring His wrath to heretics, mutants, and other enemies of Humanity. We protect the faithful from the unholy and unhallowed. Sometimes with words. More often than not, with a bolter."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai ! » Les {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sœurs de Bataille{/g} sont comme un brasier allumé par l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} en personne. Elles se font l'écho de Sa voix qui voyage jusque dans les recoins les plus sombres de l'univers. Nous portons Sa colère qui s'abat sur les hérétiques, les mutants et les autres ennemis de l'humanité. Nous protégeons les fidèles des impies et des profanes. Parfois avec des mots. Et le plus souvent avec un bolter. »

languages.text: "Olmaz olur mu! {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Harp Rahibeleri{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator'un{/g} tutuşturduğu bir alevdir. O'nun, evrenin karanlık uçlarında yankılanan sesidir. Kâfirlere, mutantlara ve diğer İnsanlık düşmanlarına O'nun gazabını tattırırız. İnananları küfürden ve günahtan koruruz. Bunu bazen sözlerle, çoğu zaman bulonatarlarımızla yaparız."
languages.original_text: "It is! The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters of Battle{/g} are a fire lit by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}. They are the echo of His voice that travels through the dark expanses of the universe. We bring His wrath to heretics, mutants, and other enemies of Humanity. We protect the faithful from the unholy and unhallowed. Sometimes with words. More often than not, with a bolter."

traits.locale_text: "Olmaz olur mu! {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Harp Rahibeleri{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator{/g}'un tutuşturduğu bir alevdir. O'nun, evrenin karanlık uçlarında yankılanan sesidir. Kâfirlere, mutantlara ve diğer İnsanlık düşmanlarına O'nun gazabını tattırırız. İnananları küfürden ve günahtan koruruz. Bunu bazen sözlerle, çoğu zaman silahla yaparız."
